p.em: Protect yourself with Mullvad VPN for Linux!

description.p: Mullvad VPN app will protect you on both public and home Wi-Fi. It offers a VPN with global server infrastructure, WireGuard protocol, and multi-hop servers.

Independently audited by Cure53, Mullvad VPN doesn't track your activity. Mullvad has 600+ servers in 40+ countries with no logging policy. That guarantees that your browsing is seamless, safe, and private.
Pay with cash or cryptocurrency for maximum anonymity. No email required, no personal data collected. Connect & protect all your devices with Mullvad VPN.
Your ISP can see the websites you visit and the products you look for. With a VPN and its end-to-end encryption, your browsing remains private.
Mullvad has a strict no-logs policy, proven by audits, which ensures we don't see or collect your personal information, online activity, or location.
If you have any questions, contact us directly at support@mullvad.net or via support portal.
